translations: 同龄人，同等地位的人，相匹敌的人；（英国）贵族
凝视，费力地看；隐现；<古>看见；<古>匹敌

sentences.sentence: She gets on well with her peer group.
Teenagers may find it difficult to resist peer pressure.
sentences.translation: 青少年可能觉得很难抗拒同龄人的压力。

sentences.sentence: Climbing steep stairs to the choir gallery you peer into a cavernous interior.
sentences.translation: 登上陡峭的楼梯来到唱诗班楼座，你便可窥见如洞穴般空旷的内部。
